    private Row[] getCnae(FenixAppModuleImpl appModule, Number idProjeto) {
        ViewObjectImpl view = appModule.getTbFnxProjetoCnaeView1();
        view.reset();
        ViewCriteria vc = view.createViewCriteria();
        ViewCriteriaRow vcRow = vc.createViewCriteriaRow();
        vcRow.setAttribute("IdProjeto", idProjeto);
        vcRow.setAttribute("InStatusProjetoCnae", "A");
        vc.addRow(vcRow);
        view.applyViewCriteria(vc);
        view.setRangeSize(-1);
        view.executeQuery();
        Row[] linhas = view.getAllRowsInRange();
        view.applyViewCriteria(null);
        return linhas;
    }
